Package me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.type

Class SlashCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.Command
      • me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.type.SlashCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CategoryLimitable, ChannelLimitable, RoleLimitable, UserLimitable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PersonCommand
    @Deprecated
public class SlashCommand
extends Command
implements UserLimitable, RoleLimitable, ChannelLimitable, CategoryLimitable
    Deprecated.
    This class is deprecated and will be removed in the future. Use Command class's implementations instead.
    A Command that only can be used on servers where the command has been registered.
    Can be limited for users, roles, channels and categories.
